sub_title: Sales Director at Amway Central Asia
summary:
Experienced senior executive with the proven track record of delivering outstanding business results in sales and general management areas in several markets (Russia, Kazakhstan, Ukraine, Mongolia, Kyrgyzstan) in public and privately held companies (600+ mln dollars size).

During my carrier I successfully completed strategic transformation and crisis management projects (both commercial and operational) in large international organizations in Consumer Health, Direct Selling, Pharma sectors.

With the extensive background in sales, project management and new markets/ventures setup, my primary interests and expertise are in the fields of commercial operations, sales management, strategy, with a special focus on community management, new products/markets launches and customer digital experience. 

Leadership, people development, creation of highly effective and committed teams in a multinational, multicultural and matrix is one of my biggest passions.

awards.title: Master of Business Administration, graduated with Great Distinction
Technical University of Orel, Information Systems, graduated with honour, Russian government grant for achievements

profile_positions.description:
Member of the board of Directors, more than 100 Sales team headcount, incl. countries GMs

1.	Double-digit growth in sales in Russia and Kazakhstan, historical record of distributors number (more than 200,000), more than 1 mln customers
2.	Profit increase by 26% via changing the product mix in favor of more profitable categories, 10% buyers’ growth 
3.	Ukraine market integration and turn it to growth after several years of decline
4.	Doubling Kazakhstan market sales, #1 by market share (28%)
5.	Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan markets launch, sales plan overperformance (+30%)
6.	Development and launch of new products in healthy nutrition and personal care, entry into a new market segment (weight management), implementation of social commerce (based on Instagram and VK) 
7.	Strategies development and implementation to respond to COVID and the geopolitical crisis. Development of an anti-crisis plan, business restructuring. Achieving sales growth in times of crisis (+11% during COVID, +4% in 2022)
profile_positions.title: Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
Member of the board of Directors, 40+ headcount in Sales Center of Excellence

1.	Establishing Sales Center of Excellence
2.	High efficiency sales and marketing teams development, Direct selling Key Account Management discipline development and implementation (5 full-featured sales teams in the regions of Russia and Kazakhstan)
3.	CRM companies and loyalty programs development/execution, work with more than a million of end customers and B2B
4.	Distributor professional education strategy development, launch of professional education platforms for Nutrition, Wellness, business development in social networks. More than 200k unique users
5.	Digital transformation: Digital strategy development, digitalization of the company commercial processes, launch new Hybris based platform
6.	GTM cost optimization, cost reduction by 15%
profile_positions.title: Sales Support Director

profile_positions.description:
1.	Oracle ERP implementation in Russia, Kazakhstan, Ukraine and a number of European countries. Global business processes restructuring in the areas of finance, sales, supply chains based on Oracle ERP 
2.	Opening Kazakhstan market. The scope of the project included: organization of the sales process, assortment management, delivery of products from abroad and delivery of products within the country, ordering and payment methods, information systems and organization of operations
profile_positions.title: Operations Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. New IT strategy development and implementation.
2. 24/7/365 IT support of the company’s business (design support processes according to ITIL methodology). Customer service KPIs based performance management and reporting.
3. Project Management methodology introduction, PMO office for all company projects
4. Physical presence projects (new locations in Moscow, Irkutsk, Nizhny Novgorod, Rostov etc.). In store excellence projects.
5. Full scale document management establishment, incl. workflow, optical character recognition and archiving systems implementation
6. E-Learning implementation
7. Business Continuity Plan development. Emergency site construction. Developing, implementing and testing disaster recovery strategy for the organization
profile_positions.title: IT manager

profile_positions.description:
1.	Automation of sales forecasting and planning (scenario planning, workflow management)
2.	Key account discipline introduction based on Siebel CRM in Russia, Belarus, Ukraine and Kazakhstan
3.	PMO office setup based on PMI standard
profile_positions.title: IT/Project Manager
